title: Track your progress
description: Assess your progress via dynamic dashboards that show your aggregated data and filter by projects, locations, or reporting periods for a granular view.

title: Set up your results framework
description: Define indicators at programme level and inherit them at the contributing project level, ensuring data consistency throughout.

title: Share your results
description: Seamlessly pull together all of your results into standard reporting formats using RSR templates. Easily report your results data to the IATI registry without any coding.

title: Collaborate with your team
description: Work with your team in one single platform using a simple web interface and shared indicators, allowing everyone to regularly report on their results.
